revised_title: Observations on the Roach Fish and its Mortification
tldr: The author, William Arderon, observed the behavior and health of a roach fish kept in a glass jar. He noticed that the fish's tail would drop off and eventually lead to its death. Arderon also discovered a fibrous substance on the fish's tail, which he studied using a microscope. He found that the fish's balance was affected when part of its tail was removed, demonstrating the delicate balance in fish anatomy.
